Name: 鸿门一宴(Malicious Dinner)
About the game: Malicious Dinner is an AVG indie game I made (not a Gal or sexual game) after work. It's aslo my 1st diy game. Ur choices will drive the entire plot. Pls do it wisely. Different choices will have influence on ur quality, popularity, game difficulty and results. Including 1 bonus egg, 4 casual games, 5 careers, 6 results and 100+ hidden items. This is only 1st chapter of the story. Will optimize, update and add 4 more chapters of DLC later. 【Chapter 1】 Now U play a school girl who is invited to a volunteer-reward active, only to find it's actually a mailcious dinner. How to survive from it? When u r toasted, drink or reject? When u r framed, stay or hide? When u r harassed, hesitate or refuse? When u r abused, keep quiet or resist? 【Addition】 ★click the top left button of start menu can switch Chinese/English language. / ★It's a game made by Evkworld game engine ↑↑↑ ★E-mail me（youdian14@yeah.net） or leave a comment if u have any idea. Please do NOT do advertising / result spoiling / flaming or abusing in review. THX!
